SourceAnalyzer.Name: + More Custom Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: More custom rules represented by StyleCop+ plug-in.

StringProperty.Name: UsingDirectiveGroups
StringProperty.Description: List of the group prefix (* is a wildcard). The group separator is ; and the namespace separator is ,

BooleanProperty.Name: AliasShouldBeLast
BooleanProperty.FriendlyName: Alias should be last of using group
BooleanProperty.Description: Wheither aliased using should be grouped at the end of their respective using group

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustNotEndWithWhitespace
Rule.Context: Invalid spacing at the end of the line.
Rule.Description: Validates the spacing at the end of the each code line.

Rule.Name: CodeLineMustBeginWithIdenticalWhitespaces
Rule.Context: You should not use different characters for indention.
Rule.Description: Validates that spacing at the beginning of the each code line uses identical characters.
